info.title: Configuration for access control on workloads.

istio.security.v1beta1.AuthorizationPoli.description: AuthorizationPolicy enables access control on workloads.

rules.description: Optional. A list of rules to specify the allowed access to the workload.

istio.security.v1beta1.Rule.description: Rule allows access from a list of sources to perform a list of operations when the condition is matched.

from.description: Optional. from specifies the source of a request.

to.description: Optional. to specifies the operation of a request.

when.description: Optional. when specifies a list of additional conditions of a request.

istio.security.v1beta1.Rule.From.description: From includes a list or sources.

istio.security.v1beta1.Rule.To.description: To includes a list or operations.

key.description: The name of an Istio attribute. See the [full list of supported attributes](https://istio.io/docs/reference/config/).

values.description: The allowed values for the attribute.

istio.security.v1beta1.Source.description: Source specifies the source identities of a request.

principals.description: Optional. A list of source peer identities (i.e. service account), which matches to the "source.principal" attribute.

requestPrincipals.description: Optional. A list of request identities (i.e. "iss/sub" claims), which matches to the "request.auth.principal" attribute.

namespaces.description: Optional. A list of namespaces, which matches to the "source.namespace" attribute.

ipBlocks.description: Optional. A list of IP blocks, which matches to the "source.ip" attribute. Single IP (e.g. "1.2.3.4") and CIDR (e.g. "1.2.3.0/24") are supported.

istio.security.v1beta1.Operation.description: Operation specifies the operations of a request.

hosts.description: Optional. A list of hosts, which matches to the "request.host" attribute.

ports.description: Optional. A list of ports, which matches to the "destination.port" attribute.

methods.description: Optional. A list of methods, which matches to the "request.method" attribute. For gRPC service, this should be the fully-qualified name in the form of "/package.service/method"

paths.description: Optional. A list of paths, which matches to the "request.url_path" attribute.

istio.type.v1beta1.WorkloadSelector.description: Optional. Workload selector decides where to apply the authorization policy. If not set, the authorization policy will be applied to all workloads in the same namespace as the authorization policy.

matchLabels.description: One or more labels that indicate a specific set of pods/VMs on which a policy should be applied. The scope of label search is restricted to the configuration namespace in which the resource is present.
